post_message: A new Congressional Budget Office report shows that President Obama’s latest budget would leave us with a $486 billion budget deficit for 2015 alone and a deficit of over $7.2 trillion from 2016-2025. That’s just another reason why my first bill in the Senate requires Congress to do its job, get federal spending under control, and pass a balanced budget.
